projects.title: FREELANCE TRANSLATOR
projects.description: Since 2021, I have been perfoming general and specific translation and proofreading proyects, among others, for various clients and agencies.

projects.title: LITERARY TRANSLATOR
projects.description: From January to July 2021, I made an internship of academic articles translation and proofreading for CLINA, an academic journal belonging to the University of Salamanca.

projects.title: VOLUNTEER TRANSLATOR AND SUBTITLER
projects.description: Since June 2021, I belong to the volunteering group of TED Translators. My job mainly consists in producing the Spanish translation for TED Talkâ€™s subtitles.
